00025 if (!defined('SENAYAN_BASE_DIR')) {
00026     // main system configuration
00027     require '../../../sysconfig.inc.php';
00028     // start the session
00029     require SENAYAN_BASE_DIR.'admin/default/session.inc.php';
00030 }
00031 
00032 require SENAYAN_BASE_DIR.'admin/default/session_check.inc.php';
00033 require SIMBIO_BASE_DIR.'simbio_GUI/table/simbio_table.inc.php';
00034 
00035 // privileges checking
00036 $can_read = utility::havePrivilege('reporting', 'r');
00037 $can_write = utility::havePrivilege('reporting', 'w');
00038 
00039 if (!$can_read) {
00040     die('<div class="errorBox">'.__('You don\'t have enough privileges to access this area!').'</div>');
00041 }
00042 
00043 /* collection statistic */
00044 $table = new simbio_table();
00045 $table->table_attr = 'align="center" class="border" cellpadding="5" cellspacing="0"';
00046 
00047 // total number of titles
00048 $stat_query = $dbs->query('SELECT COUNT(biblio_id) FROM biblio');
00049 $stat_data = $stat_query->fetch_row();
00050 $collection_stat[__('Total Titles')] = $stat_data[0];
00051 
00052 // total number of items
00053 $stat_query = $dbs->query('SELECT COUNT(item_id) FROM item');
00054 $stat_data = $stat_query->fetch_row();
00055 $collection_stat[__('Total Items/Copies')] = $stat_data[0];
00056 
00057 // total number of checkout items
00058 $stat_query = $dbs->query('SELECT COUNT(item_id) FROM item AS i
00059     LEFT JOIN loan AS l ON i.item_code=l.item_code
00060     WHERE is_lent=1 AND is_return=0');
00061 $stat_data = $stat_query->fetch_row();
00062 $collection_stat[__('Total Checkout Items')] = $stat_data[0];
00063 
00064 // total number of items in library
00065 $collection_stat[__('Total Items In Library')] = $collection_stat[__('Total Items/Copies')]-$collection_stat[__('Total Checkout Items')];
00066 
00067 // total titles by GMD/medium
00068 $stat_query = $dbs->query('SELECT gmd_name, COUNT(biblio_id) AS total_titles
00069     FROM `biblio` AS b
00070     INNER JOIN mst_gmd AS gmd ON b.gmd_id = gmd.gmd_id
00071     GROUP BY b.gmd_id HAVING total_titles>0 ORDER BY COUNT(biblio_id) DESC');
00072 $stat_data = '';
00073 while ($data = $stat_query->fetch_row()) {
00074     $stat_data .= '<strong>'.$data[0].'</strong> : '.$data[1];
00075     $stat_data .= ', ';
00076 }
00077 $collection_stat[__('Total Titles By Medium/GMD')] = $stat_data;
00078 
00079 // total items by Collection Type
00080 $stat_query = $dbs->query('SELECT coll_type_name, COUNT(item_id) AS total_items
00081     FROM `item` AS i
00082     INNER JOIN mst_coll_type AS ct ON i.coll_type_id = ct.coll_type_id
00083     GROUP BY i.coll_type_id
00084     HAVING total_items >0
00085     ORDER BY COUNT(item_id) DESC');
00086 $stat_data = '';
00087 while ($data = $stat_query->fetch_row()) {
00088     $stat_data .= '<strong>'.$data[0].'</strong> : '.$data[1];
00089     $stat_data .= ', ';
00090 }
00091 $collection_stat[__('Total Items By Collection Type')] = $stat_data;
00092 
00093 // popular titles
00094 $stat_query = $dbs->query('SELECT b.title,l.item_code,COUNT(l.loan_id) AS total_loans FROM `loan` AS l
00095     LEFT JOIN item AS i ON l.item_code=i.item_code
00096     LEFT JOIN biblio AS b ON i.biblio_id=b.biblio_id
00097     GROUP BY l.item_code ORDER BY COUNT(l.loan_id) DESC LIMIT 10');
00098 $stat_data = '<ul>';
00099 while ($data = $stat_query->fetch_row()) {
00100     $stat_data .= '<li>'.$data[0].'</li>';
00101 }
00102 $stat_data .= '</ul>';
00103 $collection_stat[__('10 Most Popular Titles')] = $stat_data;
00104 
00105 // table header
00106 $table->setHeader(array(__('Collection Statistic Summary')));
00107 $table->table_header_attr = 'class="dataListHeader" colspan="3"';
00108 // initial row count
00109 $row = 1;
00110 foreach ($collection_stat as $headings=>$stat_data) {
00111     $table->appendTableRow(array($headings, ':', $stat_data));
00112     // set cell attribute
00113     $table->setCellAttr($row, 0, 'class="alterCell" valign="top" style="width: 170px;"');
00114     $table->setCellAttr($row, 1, 'class="alterCell" valign="top" style="width: 1%;"');
00115     $table->setCellAttr($row, 2, 'class="alterCell2" valign="top" style="width: auto;"');
00116     // add row count
00117     $row++;
00118 }
00119 
00120 // if we are in print mode
00121 if (isset($_GET['print'])) {
00122     // html strings
00123     $html_str = '<html><head><title>'.$sysconf['library_name'].' Membership General Statistic Report</title>';
00124     $html_str .= '<style type="text/css">'."\n";
00125     $html_str .= 'body {padding: 0.2cm}'."\n";
00126     $html_str .= 'body * {color: black; font-size: 11pt;}'."\n";
00127     $html_str .= 'table {border: 1px solid #000000;}'."\n";
00128     $html_str .= '.dataListHeader {background-color: #000000; color: white; font-weight: bold;}'."\n";
00129     $html_str .= '.alterCell {border-bottom: 1px solid #666666; background-color: #CCCCCC;}'."\n";
00130     $html_str .= '.alterCell2 {border-bottom: 1px solid #666666; background-color: #FFFFFF;}'."\n";
00131     $html_str .= '</style>'."\n";
00132     $html_str .= '</head>';
00133     $html_str .= '<body>'."\n";
00134     $html_str .= '<h3>'.$sysconf['library_name'].' - '.__('Collection Statistic Report').'</h3>';
00135     $html_str .= '<hr size="1" />';
00136     $html_str .= $table->printTable();
00137     $html_str .= '<script type="text/javascript">self.print();</script>'."\n";
00138     $html_str .= '</body></html>';
00139     // write to file
00140     $file_write = @file_put_contents(REPORT_FILE_BASE_DIR.'biblio_stat_print_result.html', $html_str);
00141     if ($file_write) {
00142         // open result in new window
00143         echo '<script type="text/javascript">parent.openWin(\''.SENAYAN_WEB_ROOT_DIR.'/'.FILES_DIR.'/'.REPORT_DIR.'/biblio_stat_print_result.html\', \'popMemberReport\', 800, 500, true)</script>';
00144     } else { utility::jsAlert('ERROR! Loan statistic report failed to generate, possibly because '.REPORT_FILE_BASE_DIR.' directory is not writable'); }
00145     exit();
00146 }
